title: L-Carnosine loaded on carboxymethyl cellulose hydrogels for promoting wound healing
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18317-18329
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00135D, Paper

Wei Zhang, Xinyi Li, Wenjian Chen, Xiaoyi Huang, Tianfeng Hua, Jinpeng Hu, Jing Zhu, Sheng Ye, Xiaojing Li
A novel carboxymethyl cellulose hydrogel loaded with L-carnosine exhibits remarkable efficacy in enhancing the wound-healing process.
